title: Rebirth of a Star - Novel Updates
tags: Celebrities   Female Protagonist   Modern Day   Showbiz   Singers   Transmigration
author: Púgōngyīng Yāojing   蒲公英妖精
description:
A young opera singer passed to modern times as the daughter of high-ranking officials. She couldn’t forget the stage that she watched and decided to be a star.

Looking at the changing world of the entertainment circle, she set her empty hands on the stars… A Woman like blue and white porcelain, like fired porcelain, sharpen her shine and eventually amaze the world. This is a starlight world in which reality and fantasy intertwined.

By no means would she take general criticism as a personal attack. Susu said, “As a matter of fact, I’m not a natural fool.”

Everyone,”…”>
